title: Voltage partners with Google Cloud to boost global Bitcoin Lightning adoption
description:
Voltage, a Bitcoin Lightning infrastructure provider, has partnered with Google Cloud to increase its hosting capacity and locations globally. According to a May 19 statement, the partnership would allow Voltage users to create Bitcoin Lightning nodes anywhere in the world. However, initial operations would be in Iowa, Netherlands, and Singapore. Voltage stated that its protocol […]

The post Voltage partners with Google Cloud to boost global Bitcoin Lightning adoption appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Russian Miners Mint Crypto Worth $700 Million a Year, Mining Bill Postponed
description: Cryptocurrency miners in Russia have extracted digital currencies for around $700 million last year, according to a state-run fintech entity. However, the growing industry remains unregulated with the government having postponed the adoption of the respective legislation once again. Russian Crypto Miners Produce Coins for up to 60 Billion Rubles in 2022 Miners operating in […]

title: US Fed to cease Silvergate Capital and Bank activity
description: Regulatory crackdown on Silvergate Capital and Silvergate Bank continues as the Federal Reserve and California's DFPI issue a cease and desist order, halting operations.

title: CFTC considers changing risk rules to address crypto volatility
description: The CFTC has proposed a comprehensive revamp of its risk management regulations, emphasizing the need for firms to prepare themselves for the volatility of cryptocurrencies and the associated risks of holding customers' digital assets.

title: Swiss National Bank explores if Bitcoin could Oust Fiat currencies and become global currency
description:
The Swiss National Bank’s recent Cryptoassets and Financial Innovation conference featured a keynote by economist Lawrence H. White, exploring the potential for Bitcoin and other digital assets to challenge or even replace fiat currencies. While White doesn’t foresee a sweeping shift from fiat currencies due to their incumbent network effect benefits, he acknowledges the possibility [...]

Der Beitrag Swiss National Bank explores if Bitcoin could Oust Fiat currencies and become global currency erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.

title: XRP Could Explode by Up to 200%, Predicts Analyst Who Nailed Bitcoin’s 2022 Bottom – But There’s a Catch
description:
A popular crypto analyst believes that XRP is primed for a triple-digit rally as a decision on the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) lawsuit against Ripple looms. The pseudonymous analyst DonAlt tells 50,900 subscribers of the TechnicalRoundup YouTube channel that XRP has a potential upside of over 100% from the current levels. DonAlt says […]

The post XRP Could Explode by Up to 200%, Predicts Analyst Who Nailed Bitcoin’s 2022 Bottom – But There’s a Catch appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
